# unifi_voucher (Resource)

Manages UniFi hotspot vouchers for guest access.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic voucher - 1 hour access
resource "unifi_voucher" "basic" {
  site_id            = "default"
  name               = "Basic 1 Hour"
  time_limit_minutes = 60
  voucher_count      = 1
}

# Day pass voucher
resource "unifi_voucher" "day_pass" {
  site_id            = "default"
  name               = "Day Pass"
  time_limit_minutes = 1440 # 24 hours
  voucher_count      = 1
}

# Week pass voucher
resource "unifi_voucher" "week_pass" {
  site_id            = "default"
  name               = "Week Pass"
  time_limit_minutes = 10080 # 7 days
  voucher_count      = 1
}

# Batch of vouchers for event
resource "unifi_voucher" "event_batch" {
  site_id            = "default"
  name               = "Conference Event"
  time_limit_minutes = 480 # 8 hours
  voucher_count      = 50
}

# Voucher with guest limit
resource "unifi_voucher" "multi_device" {
  site_id                = "default"
  name                   = "Multi-Device Pass"
  time_limit_minutes     = 1440
  voucher_count          = 1
  authorized_guest_limit = 5 # Up to 5 devices
}

# Voucher with data limit
resource "unifi_voucher" "data_limited" {
  site_id                 = "default"
  name                    = "Data Limited Pass"
  time_limit_minutes      = 1440
  voucher_count           = 10
  data_usage_limit_mbytes = 1024 # 1 GB limit
}

# Voucher with download rate limit
resource "unifi_voucher" "speed_limited" {
  site_id            = "default"
  name               = "Speed Limited Pass"
  time_limit_minutes = 1440
  voucher_count      = 10
  rx_rate_limit_kbps = 5000 # 5 Mbps download
  tx_rate_limit_kbps = 1000 # 1 Mbps upload
}

# Premium voucher - no limits
resource "unifi_voucher" "premium" {
  site_id            = "default"
  name               = "Premium Pass"
  time_limit_minutes = 10080 # 7 days
  voucher_count      = 5
  # No rate or data limits
}

# Hotel guest voucher
resource "unifi_voucher" "hotel_guest" {
  site_id                = "default"
  name                   = "Hotel Guest WiFi"
  time_limit_minutes     = 4320 # 3 days
  voucher_count          = 1
  authorized_guest_limit = 3
  rx_rate_limit_kbps     = 10000 # 10 Mbps download
  tx_rate_limit_kbps     = 5000  # 5 Mbps upload
}

# Cafe voucher - short duration, limited bandwidth
resource "unifi_voucher" "cafe" {
  site_id                 = "default"
  name                    = "Cafe WiFi"
  time_limit_minutes      = 120 # 2 hours
  voucher_count           = 100
  authorized_guest_limit  = 1
  data_usage_limit_mbytes = 500  # 500 MB
  rx_rate_limit_kbps      = 2000 # 2 Mbps download
  tx_rate_limit_kbps      = 500  # 500 Kbps upload
}

# Full-featured voucher
resource "unifi_voucher" "full_featured" {
  site_id                 = "default"
  name                    = "Full Featured Pass"
  time_limit_minutes      = 2880 # 48 hours
  voucher_count           = 25
  authorized_guest_limit  = 2
  data_usage_limit_mbytes = 5120  # 5 GB
  rx_rate_limit_kbps      = 20000 # 20 Mbps download
  tx_rate_limit_kbps      = 10000 # 10 Mbps upload
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name/note for the voucher.
- `site_id` (String) The site ID.

### Optional

- `authorized_guest_limit` (Number) Maximum number of guests that can use this voucher. Leave empty for unlimited.
- `data_usage_limit_mbytes` (Number) Data usage limit in megabytes. Leave empty for unlimited.
- `rx_rate_limit_kbps` (Number) Download rate limit in kbps. Leave empty for unlimited.
- `time_limit_minutes` (Number) Time limit in minutes. Defaults to `60`.
- `tx_rate_limit_kbps` (Number) Upload rate limit in kbps. Leave empty for unlimited.
- `voucher_count` (Number) Number of vouchers to generate. Defaults to `1`.

### Read-Only

- `code` (String) The voucher code (generated).
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the first voucher.
